Package org.semispace

Interface Summary
SemiEventListener<E extends SemiEvent> Event listener interface
SemiLease Lease which can be used to either cancel or renew the held object, if possible.
SemiSpaceInterface Operations possible to perform on space, inspired by the JavaSpace interface.
 

Class Summary
DistributedEvent Used for distributing event through terracotta.
ElementLease Lease for an object in the space
EventDistributor Used for distributing event through terracotta.
Holder Holder of an entry written into the space.
HolderContainer Container for holder elements.
HolderElement  
ListenerHolder Holds a reference to the listener, including how long it shall live.
ListenerLease  
NameValueQuery  
SemiBlockingListener Block until notification or timeout.
SemiEventRegistration Registration object for an event.
SemiSpace A tuple space implementation which can be distributed with terracotta.
SemiSpaceStatistics Holder for statistical elements
